About Me

Who i am

I'm a passionate Front-End Developer with experience in Back-End technologies. With a strong foundation in web development, I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly websites and applications.

My journey in web development started 5 years ago, and since then I've worked on various projects ranging from small business websites to complex web applications. I'm constantly learning and adapting to new technologies to deliver the best solutions.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying outdoor activities.

My Services

Front-End Development

Building responsive, interactive, and user-friendly interfaces with modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks.

Back-End Development

Developing robust server-side applications, APIs, and database management with Laravel (PHP) and other back-end technologies.

Responsive Design

Creating websites that look and function perfectly on all devices, from desktop to mobile, with a mobile-first approach.

UI/UX Design

Designing intuitive user interfaces and experiences that are both beautiful and functional, focusing on user needs.

SEO Optimization

Optimizing websites for search engines to improve visibility and ranking, driving more organic traffic to your site.

Maintenance & Support

Providing ongoing maintenance, updates, and support to keep your website secure, up-to-date, and running smoothly.
